NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Garments for biological or chemical protection

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03B03

TITLE.P: Surgical drapes and associated products: Department clothing, gauze masks, headgear, marking pens, lifting sheets, and other associated products for the health trusts in Health Region West.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The contracting authority wants offers on:
—— surgical gauze masks classification 2 with and without visors,
—— surgical gauze masks classification 2 with extra mouth adjustment,
—— surgical gauze masks, class R2 watertight with and without visors
8. Washing sets for EDA and spinal, Haukeland.

MAIN_SITE.P: The hospitals in Helse Vest RHF.

INFO_ADD.P: The tender, including the completed annexes shall be in Norwegian. Any enclosed studies and brochures can be in Norwegian, a Scandinavian language or English.
